short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension with an ability to preform basic tasks for Travian game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For game Travian: Legends and Travian: Kingdoms.
Preform basic tasks inside game like:
*build structures
*raid players
*train troops
*send resources
